title: I Want to Share Delicious Things
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Maki-chaaan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Did the tea cookies Kanata gave you earlier not suit your tastes?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Because you only ate one, and you’re not eating the rest at all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>N-, no! It’s not like that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s not?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>T-, they’re really delicious, so I just thought it would be a waste to eat all of them at once....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Plus, I was thinking of sharing these cookies with Rin and Hanayo, so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Maki-chan....! Geez, if it’s like that, then say it earlier~. Kanata still has a lot of cookies left, so eat a bunch, okay♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
